name: The Depths
description: The depths is a first person horror puzzle solving game with elements of stealth and exploration as You play as a 45 year old man who wakes up in this new world Trying to finger out what happen, how did you get here and if there is away out while soon figuring out that this world is not what it seems and can turn the purest souls against and as you go deeper down solving puzzles sneaking past enemies and hiding from the shadow beast you will find your self being abele to see past the wood and meatal witnessing for what hides behind the walls, the curations that where made, the secret's left behind and how you carry the one thing the denizens need most.
